   sphinx-quickstart on Thu Jun  7 10:13:02 2018.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to WISC's documentation!
================================

A simple ReadtheDocs reference guide to all functions used to estimate:

- The length of roads for each requested country in the world.
- The Rural accesibility Index.

Note that the explanation of the functions in this reference guide is mainly focused on the explanation of the inputs and outputs. Please refer to the source code for a step-by-step explanation of the code.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Documentation
 
   readme
   utils
   prepare
   analyze
